array.string: Towing should always be the sequence whenever a glider is towed, whether to towplane is solo or dual.
If a glider is towed use Towing instead.
This is strictly for the training of tow pilots who have not towed solo before.
This is for when the towplane itself is being moved. If a glider is towed use Towing.
This is towplane maintenance flights. If a glider is towed use Towing.
This is for currency and APC flights for tow pilots who have already towed solo. If a glider is towed use Towing.
This is to upgrade current tow pilots to check, standards, or x-country. For new training use Tow Course.
